type.name: org.gradle.api.publish.ivy.IvyDependency
type.description: * A module dependency declared in an ivy dependency descriptor published as part of an {@link IvyPublication}.

method.name: getConfMapping
method.description: * The configuration mapping string that will be output for this dependency. * A null value indicates that no "conf" attribute will be written for this dependency. * * @return the configuration mapping

method.name: getModule
method.description: * The module value for this dependency.

method.name: getOrganisation
method.description: * The organisation value for this dependency.

method.name: getRevision
method.description: * The revision value for this dependency.

property.name: confMapping
property.description: * The configuration mapping string that will be output for this dependency. * A null value indicates that no "conf" attribute will be written for this dependency. * * @return the configuration mapping

property.name: module
property.description: * The module value for this dependency.

property.name: organisation
property.description: * The organisation value for this dependency.

property.name: revision
property.description: * The revision value for this dependency.
